entry.title: Margarita Lime - Body Wash
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: Body Wash
Price: 10.00

Fresh raspberries, cashmere woods, sandalwood and creamy vanilla are the base of this timeless fragrance.

The wonders of white lava are the basis of this incredibly mild, full foaming exfoliating wash. Perfect for all skin types, the scrubbing action of white lava particulates suspended throughout gently buff and polish dry, tired skin. Feel rejuvenated with every use. Natural based surfactants cause the foaming action – with no Sodium Lauryl Sulfate! This makes for a wonderfully effective, 95%natural based product perfect for all skin types.

9oz bottles are available in our several of our best selling scents.

Ingredients: Deionized Water, Decyl Polyglucoside, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Acrylates Copolymer, Lava Powder, Glycerine (Vegetable), Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Phenoxyethanol and Caprylyl Glycol (Optiphen®)

Contains Essential Oil and/or Phthalate Free Fragrance.

Test on skin before use, may contain allergens.

entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: Gift Card
Price: 10.00 - 100.00 (4 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Topher's Beard + Soap Co. gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.
